# Table of Contents

## Simple

```````````````````````````````` example
# H1
.
<h1 id="h1">H1</h1>
.
<section class="toc">
<ul>
<li><a href="#h1">H1</a></li>
</ul>
<section>
````````````````````````````````

## Complex

```````````````````````````````` example
# H1
## H2
### H3
#### H4
# H1 B
# H1 `C`
.
<h1 id="h1">H1</h1>
<h2 id="h2">H2</h2>
<h3 id="h3">H3</h3>
<h4>H4</h4>
<h1 id="h1-b">H1 B</h1>
<h1 id="h1-c">H1 <code>C</code></h1>
.
<section class="toc">
<ul>
<li><a href="#h1">H1</a>
<ul>
<li><a href="#h2">H2</a>
<ul>
<li><a href="#h3">H3</a></li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li><a href="#h1-b">H1 B</a></li>
<li><a href="#h1-c">H1 <code>C</code></a></li>
</ul>
<section>
````````````````````````````````

## Insane

```````````````````````````````` example
# H1
### H3
## H2
#### H4
### H3 B
# H1 B
.
<h1 id="h1">H1</h1>
<h3 id="h3">H3</h3>
<h2 id="h2">H2</h2>
<h4>H4</h4>
<h3 id="h3-b">H3 B</h3>
<h1 id="h1-b">H1 B</h1>
.
<section class="toc">
<ul>
<li><a href="#h1">H1</a>
<ul>
<li><a href="#h3">H3</a></li>
<li><a href="#h2">H2</a>
<ul>
<li><a href="#h3-b">H3 B</a></li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li><a href="#h1-b">H1 B</a></li>
</ul>
<section>
````````````````````````````````


## Link in Heading


```````````````````````````````` example
# [foo](/bar)
.
<h1 id="foo"><a href="/bar">foo</a></h1>
.
<section class="toc">
<ul>
<li><a href="#foo">foo</a></li>
</ul>
<section>
````````````````````````````````
